thread.title: Anonymous
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: I booked an appointment online and I honestly didn't think anything good would come out of it. I was so stressed out and in so much debt I didn't think anyone could help me at this point. I met with Jackie who was so pleasant and made me feel so comfortable and told me that it was OK and that she would help me get back on track, and that is exactly what she did. Within five minutes she figured everything out and that five minutes took away months of overwhelming stress and I felt like i got a second chance. The hardest part was finding the courage to go there but I'm so happy that I did because they really really will help you get back on track before it's to late. Thank you Jackie
